title: Tanoshii Sansuu
synopsis: Music video for a song about arithmetic by Seiji Tanaka, and NHK Tokyo Children's Choir. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.
staff: [['Koshibe, Nobuyoshi', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Tanaka, Seiji', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Meguro, Reiko', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Katou, Akira', ['Animation Director']]]
